ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nothing, at least for a while. Try to get a 1H blunt sometime, as there are nice items to hold in your off hand, but using a worn great staff or cracked
ygData.messageBody:
According to Hand of the Willow:
> What is the next logical step beyond a cracked staff? I am a lvl 3 wizard (just started TZ) and am only familiar with the 2H blunt. What should I go for after the cracked?

Nothing, at least for a while. Try to get a 1H blunt sometime, as there are
nice items to hold in your off hand, but using a worn great staff or cracked
staff will suffice for a while. Getting better weapons has a much lower
priority than getting your next spell :)

--
